alert.note: Alert for Owens Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 2:06AM PST until December 30 at 10:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow showers will continue across the southern part of the Owens Valley, primarily south of Olancha. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. * WHERE...Owens Valley...mainly south of Olancha. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Slick and icy road conditions on US-395 have been reported and have already caused spinouts. Additional light snow remains probable through the morning hours with difficult travel conditions expected.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
